title: Loger - Real Estate SaaS Platform
description: A modern SaaS landing page for a real estate platform connecting agents and clients. Features interactive property search, agent showcases, and conversion-optimized contact forms with smooth animations.
challenges: Optimized for real estate lead generation with complex filtering systems and responsive design across all devices

title: Lily - Fintech Investment & Savings App
description: A comprehensive mobile fintech application built with React Native and Expo, designed to democratize investment and savings for everyday users. The app features secure user authentication, real-time investment tracking, automated savings goals, and portfolio management tools.
challenges: Implementing secure financial transactions, real-time data synchronization, and creating an intuitive UX for complex financial concepts

title: Ratokunbo - Secondhand Goods Marketplace
description: A React Native marketplace app for buying and selling secondhand goods. Features advanced search, real-time chat, location-based discovery, secure payments, and rating system.
challenges: Building a trust system for P2P transactions, implementing efficient image handling, and creating seamless chat functionality

title: Pursfi - Digital Payment Platform
description: A modern fintech platform for streamlined digital transactions. Features multi-currency support, real-time tracking, advanced security, and serves both individual users and businesses.
challenges: Designing for financial trust and credibility while maintaining modern aesthetics and ensuring security compliance

title: Swiftvia - Logistics & Delivery Platform
description: A conversion-optimized landing page for a logistics service. Features smooth animations, responsive design, real-time tracking demos, and strategically placed CTAs.
challenges: Creating high-converting design that communicates speed and reliability while maintaining professional credibility

title: Itini.ai - AI Travel Experience Planner
description: An AI-powered travel planning platform that creates personalized itineraries. Features smart recommendations, collaborative planning, real-time pricing integration, and interactive maps.
challenges: Integrating AI capabilities with travel APIs while maintaining fast performance and intuitive user experience
